title: how can this happen

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
im done
this shouldnt happen
fucking hell
easiest win of my life
couldve broken 6 losing streak
wtf

next time learn to finish games and show no fucking mercy.... or else u fucking lose like this...

replies.body:
You gave up 5 towers and dragon in the space of 6 minutes LOL

The Zhonyas Udyr. What a god

*sigh*

They traded Baron for dragon, (which was a bad trade) and 5th dragon is OP as fuck.

And he built it with 1:30 left in the game.
This happens because too many people misunderstand the power of the fifth dragon buff, and you guys got baron while they got 5th dragon (so why didn't you have vision on it?)
